description: Plays the iconic FAAH sound when Claude CLI replies, asks permission, terminal commands fail, tasks error, or diagnostics fire. Works with Claude Code, Copilot Chat, and any LLM CLI. Customizable sounds, per-category toggles & cooldowns.

faahClaude.enableTerminalErrors.description: Play sound on terminal command failures

faahClaude.enableClaudeReply.description: Play sound when Claude CLI replies

faahClaude.enablePermissionPrompt.description: Play sound when Claude CLI asks for permission

faahClaude.enableTaskFailures.description: Play sound on VS Code task failures

faahClaude.cooldown.description: Global cooldown between sounds in milliseconds

faahClaude.cooldownClaudeReply.description: Cooldown for Claude reply sounds in milliseconds

faahClaude.cooldownPermission.description: Cooldown for permission prompt sounds in milliseconds

faahClaude.claudeReplyPatterns.description: Additional regex patterns to detect Claude CLI replies (advanced)

faahClaude.permissionPatterns.description: Additional regex patterns to detect permission prompts (advanced)
